pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, June 2, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, June 2, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the CHEO Research Institute laboratories and will make an announcement on the Canada Summer Jobs program. A media availability will follow.

CHEO Research Institute
401 Smyth Road
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.
  • Media should enter through the entrance of Research Building No1.
  • Photo opportunity only for CHEO Research Institute laboratories visit.
  • Open media coverage for announcement and media availability.


Winnipeg, Manitoba

Media appearances

Winnipeg Free Press

5:30 p.m. â€“ Livestreamed by the Winnipeg Free Press


Please note: all times are local.
